description: See the week’s most watched stories, including tornado surveillance video, a Nigerian girl details her abduction and Monica Lewinsky speaks out.
title: In Case You Missed It: Tornado Surveillance Video
title_page: In Case You Missed It: Tornado Surveillance Video
text:
Breaking News Emails Get breaking news alerts and special reports. The news and stories that matter, delivered weekday mornings.
See the week’s most watched stories, including tornado surveillance video, a Nigerian girl details her abduction and Monica Lewinsky speaks out.
Surveillance Video Shows Devastating Effects of Twister
The fury of a tornado from a security camera’s point-of-view. Get an inside look at this twister tearing through a Mississippi church.
Exclusive: Kidnapped Nigerian Girl Details Abduction
A Nigerian girl who escaped from her abductors details how Boko Haram kidnapped hundreds of female students and forced them into the woods.
Monica Lewinsky: Bill Clinton 'Took Advantage of Me'
The woman known for her infamous affair with former President Bill Clinton said he may have taken advantage of her, but their tryst was consensual. Monica Lewinsky discusses her feelings about the affair and how it’s affected her life.
California’s Giant Redwoods Are Being Poached
Someone is cutting giant Redwoods in California and may be selling the wood.
Kindergarten Kids Have Message For Moms Everywhere
These youngsters offer their Mother’s Day plans and advice.
